duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet with customers to confirm scope of work and walk through at completion.

Assist the crew in a variety of task specific to each unique project including drilling holes, concrete sawing, installing sealer, grinding, patching holes, installing probes, equipment maintenance, soil testing, and learning to operate a proportioning polyurethane system.
Help the crew load materials, tools and equipment into the company vehicle and travel to the customer's site to complete the job.
Complete each job with high quality and attention to detail, and unload and clean the truck upon return to the shop.
Work inside and outside in the elements depending on the extent of the job being done.
